svg.text: Full 16x8 grids shown. Control row is last row (y7 on 16x8, y15 on 16x16). Columns x0..x15.
Hold first then press second = inner loop
y7 x13 Step Edit pitch -1 semitone
y7 x14 Step Edit pitch +1 semitone
Notes: Control pages are reorderable. Step Edit tools live on y0 and use full grid for step editing.
x8..x13 Select strip for step edit
Velocity tool: bottom row disables step
y1..y6 Mod values (center row = 0 in bipolar)
Based on current code: MonomeController, MonomeGroupAssignActions, MonomeFileBrowserActions.
